description.value:
Trigger A living creature enters the area

Effect Shadows roil in the brazier. It casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Darkness] on itself, and then rolls initiative.

details.description: A soot-blackened brazier glows with fiendish light, shadows fickering inside.
details.disable: @Check[arcana|dc:21], @Check[occultism|dc:21], or @Check[religion|dc:21] while within 15 feet of the brazier to command it to stop, reducing its actions by 1 (or 2 on a critical success); @Check[thievery|dc:23] to find the hidden switch on the brazier that deactivates it; or 1st-rank spell, counteract DC 20, to dispel the shadow flames in one square, using any spell with the water or light traits

publication.title: Pathfinder Society Scenario #7-01: Intro to the Year of Battle's Spark: Enough is Enough

details.reset: The flames cease 1 minute after all living creatures leave the area, but after 1 hour, a well of darkness fills the brazier and it is ready to trigger again.
details.routine: (4 actions) The trap ignites shadowy flames in a @Template[line|distance:5]{5-foot square} within the area of the room. A creature that moves into or ends its turn in this fire takes @Damage[(2d6+5)[fire]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:19|basic] save). Increase the DC by 2 if the creature is in magical darkness (@Check[fortitude|dc:21|basic]).
